name: Page of Swords
fortune_telling: This card represents a young man or woman with an airy, intellectual demeanor, likely born a Capricorn, Aquarius, or Pisces, who wants to learn something new from you or have a discussion with you

light: Investing time in study and practice
Making a habit of learning new things
Outlining what you need to know
shadow: Pretending to knowledge or sophistication you do not possess
Feigning interest as a way of gaining favor
Considering only the evidence that supports conclusions you've already drawn
Rejecting the wise counsel of experienced teachers

questions_to_ask: How comfortable are you with revealing your own ignorance?
What are the marks of a good student?
To what extent are you open to new information?
